alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:09AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of western Collier County through 445 AM EDT... At 409 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout over Naples, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, North Naples, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, and Quail Creek Estate. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
